content: pull the ends of the yarn firmly the antennae use the black thread to embroider a to gather in the knitting to make an indentation smiley mouth on the front of the head cut two knot to secure the yarn and bury the yarn tails 8mm diameter circles in pink felt fabric for the inside the body cheeks and glue or sew these onto the sides of the head over the ends of the mouth rainbow caterpillar copyright © 2020 amanda berry page 3 of 3
